title: M1: Seven people found inside refrigerated lorry in Leicestershire
article: Seven people have been found inside a refrigerated lorry on the M1 after members of the public reported hearing banging from inside. Leicestershire Police said officers responded to the report at about 21:25 GMT on Thursday. The vehicle, which was moving slowly along the northbound carriageway, was stopped close to junction 24. Apost on social media by the force's roads policing unit said those found inside were "fit and well". They were arrested on suspicion of immigration offences.
